law.text: In case the policy provides that the proceeds may be payable in installments which are determinable at issue of the policy, there shall, except as otherwise permitted by the commissioner, be a table showing the amounts of the guaranteed installments.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1179, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 15, sec. 12, effective June 18, 1970.
